title: Moist lemon drizzle loaf cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '110g (4 oz) butter', '110g (4 oz) caster sugar', '2 large eggs, beaten', '225g (8 oz) plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', 'juice and zest of 3 lemons', 'For the lemon glaze', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '60g (2 1/2 oz) icing sugar']
